definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)

sentences.english: The other problem had been his response to a decision by the Kandahar-based vaccination teams to go on strike.
sentences.chinese: 另一问题是他对坎大哈种痘队罢工决定的反应。

sentences.english: U. S. combat operations are now at full tilt across the mud-baked flats of Kandahar province in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美国在阿富汗坎大哈省平原的战役正如火如荼。

sentences.english: MAPA Bureau is a charity, based in the southern province of Kandahar.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗排雷局是慈善机构，总部位于南部省份坎大哈。

sentences.english: ISAF cannot afford to let Kandahar go wrong.
They constantly threaten traffic on the highway that connects Kandahar with Herat.
sentences.chinese: 他们经常威胁连接坎大哈和赫拉特之间的公路交通。

sentences.english: The news has also been compared with the Kandahar government spokesman Ayub confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 这一消息也得到坎大哈政府发言人阿尤比的证实。

sentences.english: By 1999 he had moved to a complex of houses near Kandahar.
sentences.chinese: 1999年之前，他又搬到坎大哈附近的一套房居住。

sentences.english: Ahmed Wali Karzai, the president's half-brother, is the city's main power-broker.
sentences.chinese: 伊，总统的同父异母兄弟，坎大哈的主要权力经纪人。

sentences.english: U.S. combat operations are now at full tilt across the mud-baked flats of Kandahar province in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美国在阿富汗坎大哈省平原的战役正如火如荼。

sentences.english: They also blocked the main road out of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他们还阻塞了坎大哈的主要出城道路。

definition: Mogadishu, Indian ocean seaport and capital of Somalia
Najaf (city in Iraq, a Shia holy city)
